## ClassDecoratorManager.registerWrapper() method

Register a wrapper function for a decorator type

**Signature:**

```typescript
registerWrapper(decoratorType: string, wrapperFunction: ClassWrapperFunction): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  decoratorType | string | The decorator type (string) |
|  wrapperFunction | [ClassWrapperFunction](./koatty_container.classwrapperfunction.md) | The wrapper function |

**Returns:**

void
